hadiths.text: Jabir reported that he heard Mu'awiya say in his address that Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) died at the age of sixty-three, so was the case with Abu Bakr and 'Umar, and I (am now) sixty-three

chapter.ara-name: باب كَمْ أَقَامَ النَّبِيُّ صلى الله عليه وسلم بِمَكَّةَ وَالْمَدِينَةِ .
chapter.eng-name: How Long Did The Prophet (ﷺ) ft Stay In Makkah And Al-Madinah?
